sentences.en: And we will call upon countries to begin negotiations in January on a treaty to end the production of fissile material for weapons.
sentences.cn: 我们将呼吁各国从明年一月开始谈判一项协议，以终止可用于武器的裂变材料的生产。

sentences.en: Experts say there are two ways to make fissile material for nuclear weapons.
sentences.cn: 有关专家说,要把矿石原料制成核武器有两种办法.

sentences.en: Let me from the rigid thinking of the fissile core of difficult.
sentences.cn: 让我从僵硬的思维内核中艰难的裂变.

sentences.en: The few fissile materials could not maintain the chain type response ( overwhelming majority neutron escape ).
sentences.cn: 少量的裂变材料不能维持链式反应 ( 绝大多数中子逃逸了 ).

sentences.en: The hybrid breeders can provide plenty of fissile material for PWR or FBR.
sentences.cn: 聚变-裂变混合堆可以为压水堆或快堆提供充足的核燃料.

sentences.en: Thus, we need to start getting rid of this material along with fissile material created for weapons use.
sentences.cn: 因此，我们在清除用于制造武器的裂变材料的同时也需要开始清除这类材料。

sentences.en: To make the fissile material, he needs to develop an ability to enrich uranium.
sentences.cn: 为了得到分裂物质，他需要发展浓缩铀的能力。

sentences.en: To prove whether or not the fissile spiral type artificial head replacement conforms to biomechanics principles.
sentences.cn: 目的:论证分体螺旋式人工股骨头置换的合理性.

sentences.en: Unlike them , it declines to end the production of fissile material — uranium and plutonium — for bombs.
sentences.cn: 与五个核大国不同,它拒绝签署禁止核试条约, 它拒绝中止核燃料(铀和钚)生产.

words.tran_cn: 可分裂的；可作核裂变的
分裂生殖的；有分裂倾向的
裂变；分裂；分体；分裂生殖法
裂缝；裂沟（尤指岩石上的）
[生物]分裂性的；[地质]易分裂的

trans.tran_cn: 可进行核裂变的，易裂的，可裂的
trans.tran_en: able to be split by atomic fission
